com.burstly.lib.service
Class ServerConfigurationService

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.service.ServerConfigurationService

public class ServerConfigurationService
extends Object

This service is used to dynamically configure sdk components from server.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii
